typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	httpMethod: 'POST',
	body: '{}',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0,
	headers: ['Content-TYpe' -> 'Content-Type: multipart/form-data;', 'Authorization' -> '@concat(\'Bearer\',activity(\'Get Token\').output.access_token)'],
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'documentPerLine']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

sources.name: AzureSqlTable102
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlTable102

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared AzureSqlTable102 = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("mysqlserveracsilva.database.windows.net", "myacsilvadb", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "SalesLT", Item = "SalesOrderDetail"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = AzureSqlTable102,
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(Source, {"SalesOrderID", "OrderQty", "ProductID", "UnitPrice", "SalesOrderDetailID", "UnitPriceDiscount", "LineTotal", "rowguid", "ModifiedDate"}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Reordered columns", {"SalesOrderDetailID"}),
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns", "DAY", each Date.Day([ModifiedDate]))
in
  #"Added custom";

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

dataflowSinks.name: SinkAzureSqlTable104
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkAzureSqlTable104
